Package pp

Class NetGame

java.lang.Object
pp.NetGame
public class NetGame
extends java.lang.Object
Class for maintaining the Abalone game.
Author:
Vladi/Ivan

    • startt

      public void startt()
      Starts the Abalone game.
      Asks after each ended game if the user want to continue. Continues until the user does not want to play anymore.

    • choiceForNewGame

      public boolean choiceForNewGame()
      Asks if the player/s want to play another game of not
      Returns:
      true/false

    • boardSend

      Makes a string of all the fields on the board
      Returns:

    • reset

      private void reset()
      Resets the game.
      The board is emptied and player[0] becomes the current player.

    • randomWithRange

      Parameters:
      msg -

    • play

      public boolean play​(java.lang.String input)
      Plays the Abalone game.
      First the (still empty) board is shown. Then the game is played until it is over. Players can make a move one after the other. After each move, the changed game situation is printed.
